context_bundle.summary: PAD variable actions: Set, Increase, Decrease, Lists (Create/Add/Remove/Sort/Clear), Random, DataTables (Create/Insert/Update/Filter/Sort/FindReplace), JSON conversion, Truncate

onboarding.quick_start: Set variable: NewVar to 0. Lists: %MyList[0]% for first item. DataTable: %DT[row].ColumnName%. JSON: Convert JSON to Custom Object then access %JsonObj.property%
common_patterns: Set variable NewVar to 0|FilePath to 'C:\path'|IsProcessed to False
Create new list -> Add item 'value' into list -> %List[0]% access
Create new data table -> Insert row -> Filter data table (AND/OR rules)
known_errors: DataTable item index out of range - verify row/column exists first
JSON parse error - validate JSON syntax before conversion
List items 0-indexed - %List[0]% not %List[1]% for first item
